com.rohitsood.urlybird.util
Class StringUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.rohitsood.urlybird.util.StringUtil
public final class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Provides frequently-used String helper methods. Length fixing of String objects is provided here. Other helpers may be added here for future extension of the system.

Version:
1.3
Author:
Rohit Sood

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

fixLength

public static java.lang.String fixLength(java.lang.String string,
                                         int length)
Provides a fixed length version of a String. Returns the same String object if the length passed in is equal to the length of the String. Pads a string with spaces if the string length is less than the length of the String passed in. Prunes the string causing a loss of data - Coverts to whitespaces if a null String object is passed in. A length() call to the string returned will equal to the length passed in.

Parameters:
string - The String to fix with a length.
length - The exact length of the desired string.
Returns:
The String object that is exactly the length as specified.
